talk.abstract: Cloudant Engineer Joan Touzet will explain the design decisions that led the company to rewrite the supporting API layer to all its back-end systems in Python using the Flask microframework to create a unified, RESTful API.
talk.description: Cloudant Engineer Joan Touzet will explain the design decisions that led the company to rewrite the supporting API layer to all its back-end systems in Python using the Flask microframework to create a unified, RESTful API.
talk.name: Hit the Flask and Get Some REST: Rewriting the Cloudant API in a Single Python Back End
talk.title: Hit the Flask and Get Some REST: Rewriting the Cloudant API in a Single Python Back End
